attributes.action: Help get me a divorce from Mini Mouse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I've found out recently that my wife,Mini, has been having an affair with Donald Duck, pluto, Big & Little Ted from Playschool & Kieth Chegwin. She refuses to give me a divorce, which has left me feeling goofy, I wish she would give me one soon as goofy is starting to get angry.

Thanks
Mickey Mouse ESQ

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
